About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

I am a dedicated and ambitious student currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science and Web Development at Herat University. With a strong passion for technology and its ever-evolving nature, I am constantly seeking opportunities to expand my knowledge and skills in this field. Furthermore, my passion for web development extends beyond the classroom. I have actively engaged in personal projects, where I have honed my skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and various frameworks. These experiences have not only strengthened my technical abilities but also enhanced my creativity when it comes to designing user-friendly interfaces.
